name: PHQ9AndPHQ9MTools
title: PHQ 9 and PHQ 9M Tools
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent the PHQ 9 and PHQ 9M depression assessment scores for  adults and adolescents.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Assessment, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with LOINC codes that indicate a completed PHQ 9 and PHQ 9M depression assessment tool for adults and adolescents with a summary score.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Patient Health Questionnaire 9 item (PHQ-9) total score [Reported]
Patient Health Questionnaire-9: Modified for Teens total score [Reported.PHQ.Teen]
